00027 /* Define to prevent recursive inclusion -------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00028 #ifndef __HT32_TIME_H
00029 #define __HT32_TIME_H
00030 
00031 #ifdef __cplusplus
00032  extern "C" {
00033 #endif
00034 
00035 /* Includes ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00036 #include "ht32.h"
00037 #ifndef HTCFG_TIME_IPSEL
00038 #include "ht32_time_conf.h"
00039 #endif
00040 
00041 /* Settings ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00042 #ifdef HTCFG_TIME_IPSEL
00043 #if (HTCFG_TIME_IPSEL == 0)
00044 #define HTCFG_TIME_IPN    BFTM0
00045 #endif
00046 #if (HTCFG_TIME_IPSEL == 1)
00047 #define HTCFG_TIME_IPN    BFTM1
00048 #endif
00049 #if (HTCFG_TIME_IPSEL == 2)
00050 #define HTCFG_TIME_IPN    SCTM0
00051 #endif
00052 #if (HTCFG_TIME_IPSEL == 3)
00053 #define HTCFG_TIME_IPN    SCTM1
00054 #endif
00055 #if (HTCFG_TIME_IPSEL == 4)
00056 #define HTCFG_TIME_IPN    SCTM2
00057 #endif
00058 #if (HTCFG_TIME_IPSEL == 5)
00059 #define HTCFG_TIME_IPN    SCTM3
00060 #endif
00061 #if (HTCFG_TIME_IPSEL == 6)
00062 #define HTCFG_TIME_IPN    PWM0
00063 #endif
00064 #if (HTCFG_TIME_IPSEL == 7)
00065 #define HTCFG_TIME_IPN    PWM1
00066 #endif
00067 #if (HTCFG_TIME_IPSEL == 8)
00068 #define HTCFG_TIME_IPN    PWM2
00069 #endif
00070 #if (HTCFG_TIME_IPSEL == 9)
00071 #define HTCFG_TIME_IPN    GPTM0
00072 #endif
00073 #if (HTCFG_TIME_IPSEL == 10)
00074 #define HTCFG_TIME_IPN    GPTM1
00075 #endif
00076 #if (HTCFG_TIME_IPSEL == 11)
00077 #define HTCFG_TIME_IPN    MCTM0
00078 #endif
00079 #endif
00080 
00081 /* Exported constants --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00082 #ifndef IS_IPN_BFTM
00083 #undef IPN_MCTM0 
00084 #undef IPN_MCTM1
00085 #undef IPN_GPTM0
00086 #undef IPN_GPTM1
00087 
00088 #define IPN_NULL                        (0)
00089 #define IPN_MCTM0                       (0x4002C000)
00090 #define IPN_MCTM1                       (0x4002D000)
00091 #define IPN_GPTM0                       (0x4006E000)
00092 #define IPN_GPTM1                       (0x4006F000)
00093 #define IPN_SCTM0                       (0x40034000)
00094 #define IPN_SCTM1                       (0x40074000)
00095 #define IPN_SCTM2                       (0x40035000)
00096 #define IPN_SCTM3                       (0x40075000)
00097 #define IPN_PWM0                        (0x40031000)
00098 #define IPN_PWM1                        (0x40071000)
00099 #define IPN_PWM2                        (0x40031000)
00100 #define IPN_BFTM0                       (0x40076000)
00101 #define IPN_BFTM1                       (0x40077000)
00102 #define IPN_CHECK(IP)                   STRCAT2(IPN_, IP)
00103 #define IS_IPN_BFTM(IP)                 (IPN_CHECK(IP) == IPN_BFTM0) || (IPN_CHECK(IP) == IPN_BFTM1)
00104 #define IS_IPN_MCTM(IP)                 (IPN_CHECK(IP) == IPN_MCTM0) || (IPN_CHECK(IP) == IPN_MCTM1)
00105 #define IS_IPN_GPTM(IP)                 (IPN_CHECK(IP) == IPN_GPTM0) || (IPN_CHECK(IP) == IPN_GPTM1)
00106 #define IS_IPN_SCTM(IP)                 (IPN_CHECK(IP) == IPN_SCTM0) || (IPN_CHECK(IP) == IPN_SCTM1) || (IPN_CHECK(IP) == IPN_SCTM2) || (IPN_CHECK(IP) == IPN_SCTM3)
00107 #define IS_IPN_PWM(IP)                  (IPN_CHECK(IP) == IPN_PWM0) || (IPN_CHECK(IP) == IPN_PWM1) || (IPN_CHECK(IP) == IPN_PWM2)
00108 #define IS_IPN_TM(IP)                   (IS_IPN_MCTM(IP) || IS_IPN_GPTM(IP) || IS_IPN_SCTM(IP) || IS_IPN_PWM(IP))
00109 #endif
00110 
00111 #define _HTCFG_TIME_PORT                          STRCAT2(HT_, HTCFG_TIME_IPN)
00112 
00113 #if (HTCFG_TIME_CLKSEL == 0)
00114 #define _HTCFG_TIME_CORECLK                       (LIBCFG_MAX_SPEED)
00115 #else
00116 #define _HTCFG_TIME_CORECLK                       (HTCFG_TIME_CLK_MANUAL)
00117 #endif
00118 
00119 #if (LIBCFG_CKCU_NO_APB_PRESCALER == 1)
00120 #undef HTCFG_TIME_PCLK_DIV
00121 #define HTCFG_TIME_PCLK_DIV                       (0)
00122 #endif
00123 
00124 #define HTCFG_TIME_CLKSRC                         (_HTCFG_TIME_CORECLK >> HTCFG_TIME_PCLK_DIV)
00125 
00126 #if (IS_IPN_BFTM(HTCFG_TIME_IPN))
00127 #undef HTCFG_TIME_TICKHZ
00128 #define HTCFG_TIME_TICKHZ                         HTCFG_TIME_CLKSRC
00129 #endif
00130 
00131 /* Exported macro ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00132 #define TIME_TICKDIFF(start, current)             ((current >= start) ? (u32)(current - start) : (u32)(0xFFFFFFFF - start + 1 + current))
00133 
00134 #if (HTCFG_TIME_TICKHZ < 1000000)
00135 #define TIME_US2TICK(us)                          (us / (1000000UL / HTCFG_TIME_TICKHZ))
00136 #define TIME_TICK2US(t)                           (t * (1000000UL / HTCFG_TIME_TICKHZ))
00137 #else
00138 #define TIME_US2TICK(us)                          (us * (HTCFG_TIME_TICKHZ / 1000000UL))
00139 #define TIME_TICK2US(t)                           (t / (HTCFG_TIME_TICKHZ / 1000000UL))
00140 #endif
00141 
00142 #if (HTCFG_TIME_TICKHZ < 1000)
00143 #define TIME_MS2TICK(ms)                          (ms / (1000UL / HTCFG_TIME_TICKHZ))
00144 #define TIME_TICK2MS(t)                           (t * (1000UL / HTCFG_TIME_TICKHZ))
00145 #else
00146 #define TIME_MS2TICK(ms)                          (ms * (HTCFG_TIME_TICKHZ / 1000UL))
00147 #define TIME_TICK2MS(t)                           (t / (HTCFG_TIME_TICKHZ / 1000UL))
00148 #endif
00149 
00150 #define TIME_S2TICK(s)                            (s * (u32)(HTCFG_TIME_TICKHZ))
00151 #define TIME_TICK2S(t)                            (t / (HTCFG_TIME_TICKHZ))
00152 
00153 
00154 #define GET_CNT()                                 (_HTCFG_TIME_PORT->CNTR)
00155 
00156 /* Exported functions --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00157 void Time_Init(void);
00158 void Time_Delay(u32 delay);
00159 u32 Time_GetTick(void);
00160 
00161 #if (IS_IPN_BFTM(HTCFG_TIME_IPN))
00162 // BFTM
00163 #define Time_GetTick    GET_CNT
00164 #endif
